turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order some pizza, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Bella Luna Pizzeria.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order four small pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like meat lover's pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want the same for all 4?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, any other requests for your pizzas?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you are ordering 4 thick crust meat lovers pizzas, correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $52, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will be picking up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas should be ready in 30 minutes, please make sure to show them your receipt which will be texted to you shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. No, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizzas.
